text: You can bet that prying strangers ain't welcome around Innsmouth.
author: HPL

text: At other times he worked in the garden, but as there was little to do in the frosty season, he read to the old man and Agatha.
author: MWS

text: I, not in deed, but in effect, was the true murderer.
author: MWS

text: All this I endeavoured to veil, so that it might least impress my Idris; yet, as I have said, my courage survived even despair: I might be vanquished, but I would not yield.
author: MWS
